messages.title: Message from Nick Brown
messages.content: The Prime Minister has chosen to call a vanity General Election. The Government should be working to get the best deal for Britain as part of the Brexit negotiations. I am standing on my record as a full-time, hard-working local MP. East based on my record and my pledge to be a public servant to the people of Newcastle upon Tyne East, based on my record as a full-time, hard-working local MP and my pledge to be a public servant to the people I have served for 34 years. This Tory Government has starved our public services through years of austerity and more action from Government on moving funding and investment to Newcastle and our region.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: This Tory Government has starved our public services through years of austerity.
More action from Government on moving funding and investment to Newcastle and our region.

community.content: More action from Government on moving funding and investment to Newcastle and our region.

quotes.text: I would be grateful for your support on Thursday 8th June.
